body:
Use this service to find out: 
* what is the most suitable way of agreeing child arrangements.
* if going to court is right for you
 
Youâ€™ll be asked general questions about your relationship with the other parent and previous attempts to agree child arrangements with them.

components.html: You're completely anonymous while using this service and no one will ever see your answers.

heading: Check your options for child arrangements
lede: Child arrangements is also known as contact, access or custody. For example, you may need to decide where your children will live or rearrange the times they see you.
